citation: Proclamation under the Gene Technology (Tasmania) Act 2012 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Gene Technology (Tasmania) Act 2012

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Gene Technology (Tasmania) Act 2012 fix 27 June 2012 as the day on which that Act commences.

27 June 2012

PETER G. UNDERWOOD

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

BRYAN GREEN

Minister for Primary Industries and Water

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 27 June 2012

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Primary Industries, Parks, Water and Environment.
